concept.title: Error Record Functions
concept.shortdesc: Error record functions provide information about error records. Use error functions to process error records.

conbody.p: functionserror record functionserror recordsfunctionsFor example, you might use error functions in a Stream Selector to pass data to different error handling pipelines based on the type of error that occurred.
The expression language provides the following error functions:

dlentry.dd: Returns the error code for the error record.
Returns the ID of the that sent the record to error.
By default, the Data Collector ID uses the format <hostname>:<port>. You can verify the ID in the Configuration page.
Returns the error message for the error record.
The name of pipeline that sent the record to error.
Returns the instance name of the stage that sent the record to error.
You can verify the instance name on the General tab of the stage.
Returns the user-defined label for the stage that sent the record to error.
The time the record was sent to error.
